name: pick and shoot
description:
A small game made for GMTK game jam 2021 which I made in 10 hours... TT

The Theme is Joined Together.  So, I made a bullet-hell-ish game, in which you can pick weapon droped by the enemy and joined together with them. 

I started this project fairly late, so I made it in 10 hours, as a result, the quality is not very impressive, and game art are temporary. (BTW, this is my best art work so far. I'm so not good at it...)

This game were inspired by Reassembly, a neat and fun game.

Control:

Press WASD to move,  Left mouse button to shoot, Right mouse button to drop the last weapon you picked (to increase move speed or pick another weapon)

There are three weapons, they all have different features,  and I made a tutorial to show the basic controls.

Have Fun!
